DDL:
CREATE TABLE campaign_identifier (
    campaign_id INTEGER,
    products VARCHAR(3),
    campaign_name VARCHAR(33),
    start_date TEXT,
    end_date TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE events (
    visit_id VARCHAR(6),
    cookie_id VARCHAR(6),
    page_id INTEGER,
    event_type INTEGER,
    sequence_number INTEGER,
    event_time TEXT
);
